headerSection.titleOne: Aspiring Full-stack Developer with a Focus on React and Next.js
headerSection.bio: Self-taught full-stack developer with 18+ months of full-time study, focused on building dynamic applications using React, Next.js, and MongoDB. Adaptable, eager to learn new tools, and committed to contributing positively within team environments.

responsibilities: Administered the Canvas LMS for 500-700 users, focusing on data consistency and enhancing user experience.
Oversaw user accounts, permissions, and content updates with a focus on reliability and consistency.
Improved UX for parents and students by creating accessible homepages summarizing weekly content.
Provided daily technical support and training to all employees, students, and parents.
Led a team of four members delivering of a full curriculum update to CCSS Wonders 2020 curriculum over three years.
Created core curriculum assessments. This involved managing online material, designing material for print, proofreading, and version control through regular updates.
Created supplementary digital material for distribution at six company branches, used regularly by over 65% of employees.
Managed and trained four full-time employees at a private education branch each year, specialized in teaching supplementary English lessons.
Created a welcoming and engaging environment by proactively identifying student needs and implementing targeted strategies.
Managed three different branches over, each year assigned to the branch that represented the biggest challenge for the company.
Maintained 85%+ student retention through strategic leadership and targeted interventions.
Taught at least 10 hours per week of 2-hour lessons each year with students aged 7 to 18 in English-immersion environments.
Interviewed and recruited employees over three years resulting in seven successful hires and four employees staying over two years.
